topic.title: HPE Helion 2.0 Development Platform: Vertica Integration for Administrators

body.p: Vertica Community Edition 7.1.2 is packaged and distributed in the Vertica Preview included with HPE Helion Development Platform 2.0.
Vertica Community Edition supports 3 nodes and has a 1TB limit. There is no way to modify these limitations.

ol.li: Create a Vertica Preview single instance or cluster using HDP Database Service. For production deployments, clusters are recommended for high availability.
Reset and obtain the root password for Vertica database.
Add user to Vertica database by using vertica client.
Configure ALS cluster for connectivity to Vertica.
Provide the Vertica connection parameters to application developers.
